channel.title: Need help, I'm busy, not in the mood for thinking :\
channel.description:
I need my friends' help on this one. I need these codes I have added the the ID's in order that they appear in my requests.
using [i]knife[/i] with [i]normal log[/i] adds [i]15 arrow shafts[/i](946, 1511, 52) using [i]15 feathers[/i] with [i]15 shafts[/i] adds [i]15 headless arrows[/i](314, 52, 53) using [i]15 headless arrows[/i] with [i]15 bronze-rune arrowheads[/i] adds [i]15 bronze-rune arrows[/i](53, odd numbers 2349 - 2363, even numbers 882 - 892)
They all add skill XP 100 bronze, +100 each arrow, rune being 600 XP The shafts and headless arrows add 100xp. Fletching skill is 9
THANK YOU
EDIT:It's knife with normal log, my server has it other way for bows >.>
